docs.snippet: J. A. Flores da Cunha, ex-Governor of the State of Rio Grande do Sul, was charged today by the War Department with ordering armament for his State Military Brigade in excess of normal needs and without authorization by the War Department.
docs.lead_paragraph: J. A. Flores da Cunha, ex-Governor of the State of Rio Grande do Sul, was charged today by the War Department with ordering armament for his State Military Brigade in excess of normal needs and without authorization by the War Department.
docs.abstract: Flores da Cunha charged with importing arms from Germany

headline.main: BRAZILIANS ACCUSE FUGITIVE GOVERNOR; Flores da Canha Charged With Large Importation of Arms From Plants in Germany

docs.snippet: COLOMBIA, already with twenty or more short-wave stations on the air, has added another highpowered broadcaster to the list. When tuned during the past week, the new station, located at Bucaramanga just east of the Magdalena River, has been sending a...
docs.lead_paragraph: COLOMBIA, already with twenty or more short-wave stations on the air, has added another highpowered broadcaster to the list. When tuned during the past week, the new station, located at Bucaramanga just east of the Magdalena River, has been sending a signal which surpasses, in volume and clarity, the general run of South American waves.

headline.main: RADIO'S SHORT WAVES; Colombia Has New Station in Mountains--News From the Foreign Broadcasters

docs.snippet: As a reminder to those sending Christmas mail or packages to foreign countries, Postmaster Goldman announced yesterday the mail closing dates for the next week. These dates are the last sailings, for the countries listed below, that will arrive at...
docs.lead_paragraph: As a reminder to those sending Christmas mail or packages to foreign countries, Postmaster Goldman announced yesterday the mail closing dates for the next week. These dates are the last sailings, for the countries listed below, that will arrive at their destinations in time for Christmas delivery.

headline.main: CLOSING MAIL DATES ON SHIP LINES LISTED; Early Sending of Christmas Packages Urged as Means to End

docs.snippet: Fourteen seamen of the governmentowned freighter Algic, who "sat down" in sympathy with longshoremen on strike in Montevideo, Uruguay, were indicted by a Federal grand jury today for conspiracy to revolt and "unlawfully and feloniously endeavoring to...
docs.lead_paragraph: Fourteen seamen of the governmentowned freighter Algic, who "sat down" in sympathy with longshoremen on strike in Montevideo, Uruguay, were indicted by a Federal grand jury today for conspiracy to revolt and "unlawfully and feloniously endeavoring to make a revolt."
docs.abstract: 14 of Algic crew indicted on mutiny charges

headline.main: 14 SEAMEN OF ALGIC INDICTED IN SIT-DOWN; Mutiny Laws Are Invoked at Baltimore for Sympathy Strike at Montevideo
